body.name: Delta Children Tribeca 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, White/Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 2 mins
features: SAFE OPTION FOR YOUR BABY: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by ASTM ; We know chemicals have no place in your nursery, so we use a non-toxic multi-step painting process that is lead and phthalate safe

QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of sustainable New Zealand pine wood and TSCA compliant engineered wood ; Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed ASTM safety standards ; Assembled Dimensions: 55”W x 30.5”D x 36”H ; Easy to assemble

4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from a crib to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed with headboard & footboard (Daybed Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #0080 and Full Size Bed Rails #0050 sold separately). Care & Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Adjustable height mattress support with 3 convenient positions to grow with your baby
COORDINATING ITEMS: Uses a standard size crib mattress (sold separately) ; To ensure the perfect fit pair your crib with a Delta Children, Serta, Beautyrest or Simmons Kids crib mattress
body.description: Designed to be the centerpiece of your nursery, the Tribeca 4-in-1 Crib from Delta Children exudes contemporary cool. Featuring plenty of modern touches it boasts a sleek x-shaped base and bold two-tone finish. Crafted from strong and sturdy wood, this multi-positional crib converts to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed, and is JPMA certified, ensuring it meets the highest standards in safety.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Beautyrest Beginnings Black Brilliant Sun Crib and Toddler Mattress Delta Children Ava 3 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top Revolve Reversible Stroller And Carriage/Pram Add-On Bundle Delta Children Rowen Upholstered Rocking Chair Little Lambs Adjustable Swaddle Wrap - 100% Cotton - Size Large, 4-Pack, Unisex Coordinating Items (sold separately) Create an unparalleled sleep experience for your little one with the Beautyrest Beginnings Black Brilliant Sun Crib and Toddler Mattress. A modern and sleek dresser that features a convenient, removable changing top. Available in White or Black Espresso/White. The ultimate stroller and carriage bundle allows the Revolve Stroller to effortlessly grow with your little one Enjoy the supreme comfort of this stylish rocking chair as you bond with baby. Available in Dove Grey or Graphite. The 4 Pack of Little Lambs Adjustable Swaddle Wraps by Delta Children mimics the safety and comfort of mom’s womb and helps prevent startle reflex, promoting a safer, sounder sleep for your newborn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this crib!!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. Great price. Easy set up. Great quality. Attractive piece! Got the matching dresser and I love this set in my nursery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this crib!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve had this for 2.5 years now and love it! Looks brand new still. No chipped paint, granted our baby isn’t a crib chewer. It’s very sturdy and heavy. It feels like very good quality especially for the price. We love the dark grey color. Not harsh like black but does add an edgy look to the room. Im very happy with this purchase for his nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Room is still in process but as you can see, the crib itself looks amazing…If I’m being honest, this was my second option (but it was on a hard to pass sale) and I ended up loving it even more than the one I originally wanted once assembled.Detail at the bottom makes it look unique (especially when turned into a daybed), it really catches the eye upon entering the room and already received many compliments about it.Very easy to put together and I’m 38 weeks now, of course my hubby helped but it was very straight forward overall. Feels very sturdy and we didn’t found a single defect on it, matches with all the natural wood tone accesories we’ve gotten including the dresser.Worth it even at it’s regular price.I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and value
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this crib for grandparents house and it’s worked out wonderfully. Clean lines on the crib frame, with the colors, make it look modern and not too bulky which is key for grandparents home. It truly blends in with most decor. I really was looking for something sturdy, of good value, and that could be used in the future. It’s certainly sturdy, functional, and I have no doubt it will hold up to the shenanigans of my rambunctious baby. The price is great for what you’re getting, especially considering it is convertible. It actually already comes with a piece to allow conversion to the toddler bed (you can just buy the toddler rail separately) which you usually have to purchase separately. Only negative is that since I didn’t realize the conversion piece was included, i spent far too long trying to figure out how to use the hardware associated with that piece. If I had known from the start putting it together would have taken only 30 minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tribeca 4-in-1 Baby Convertible Crib
reviews.reviewText: Well made, sturdy.Easy to assemble and put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After 2.5 months of waiting, it finally arrived!
reviews.reviewText: I order this crib on Sept. 2 with anticipation for my newborns arrival (due date Nov 24). After shipping rescheduled 3 times, I finally received it on Nov 17th. Talk about cutting it close! I was so worried that my order was going to be cancelled by the seller or Amazon, I almost cancelled it myself and bought it somewhere else in order to have it on time. But my gut intuition said to hold out a bit longer. Thankfully it was right. My husband I just built it and it matches so good in the baby room and looks super cute. Not a crib style you can find anywhere. It was relatively easy to assemble, though having 2 people made it significantly easier. I can’t imagine having left myHusband to do it alone. It would have taken double the time. There were extra parts at the end of building it, which at first was alarming, but then we realized they are meant to be used when the crib converts to a toddler bed. I wish it came with some sort of packaging or case to store those extra parts. We will just store it in the closet for now. It has 3 height levels to lower when the baby starts to get tall. Overall, without having used it with a child inside, it’s a good buy. Don’t forget to buy the crib mattress separately. I bought one from Amazon that is a standard universal size and it fits perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great crib, just needs to be more sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful design and it was easy to put together. The only thing I would recommend for this, is that it should ABSOLUTELY come with wall securing mounts. I had to purchase some separately, due to the design at the foot of the crib, there's no support on the bottom on the outside perimeter, the crib is easily wobbles side to side. It could possibly be partial due to my carpet height? But still, I don't think it should be wobbling as much as it does. So my concern is when the baby gets older and is standing up and is pushing himself back-and-forth on the rail as toddlers do.... that it could tip over with his weight.... Or my other concern is, if hes laying in his crib in my 4 1/2 year old happens to come up and try to jump to see him better while holding on to the side, it may tip. When you put any weight on the side rail, it does tip towards you a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical at first when my daughter sent me this crib to purchase. When I first saw it, I was not sure about purchasing a crib on Amazon. I’m old school and prefer to go to a shop and purchase! Omg this crib is beautiful and the quality was absolutely great!!
